title: Garlic Naan
description: Soft, fluffy Indian flatbread topped with garlic
instructions: Mix flour, sugar, salt, baking powder, and baking soda.
Add yogurt, milk, and oil. Mix well.
Gradually add warm water and knead into a soft dough.
Cover and let rest for 2 hours.
Divide dough into 6 portions and roll into oval shapes.
Sprinkle minced garlic and coriander on top, press gently.
Heat a tawa or skillet, place naan and cook until bubbles form.
Flip and cook the other side.
Brush with butter and serve hot.
notes: For best results, use a very hot skillet. You can also use a tandoor or oven set to maximum temperature.
